casebody.data:
Thomas O’Reilly, et al., Respondents v. The New York Elevated Railroad Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 9, 1891. Appeal from a judgment *582entered on-the findings and decision of a judge on a trial at special term, before the court without a jury. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Sackett & Bennett, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
